value:
Curious about what's in these eggs?
You should be! I placed a real special
curse on them. You'll love it!

I couldn't really celebrate like this in
Plegia. I mean, if you let your guard
down there, you might get cursed!

Huh? Tharja's taking part in the
spring festival too? And here I
thought she didn't like socializing.

Isn't the weather lovely? You know
what else would be lovely? Me
putting a sleeping curse on you.$k$pHear me out! You'd be able to
snooze in the sun forever!

I bet General Mustafa would get a
real kick out of seeing me in this. He
might even give me treats again...

Nothing says "spring is here" like a
curse to make you cheerful from
your friend $Nf.

Hippity-hop, hippity-hop! When the
curses start, they never stop!

Just because I'm dressed all cute
and fluffy doesn't mean I won't curse
you!

Hmm. Maybe I'm not really cut out
for this season...

I wish I had a curse that would make
spring last forever.

I'm Henry, a dark mage. You sure you
want to invite me to this festival?
Who knows what I might do... Hah!

You know, I've never really been
interested in the spring until now, but
this could be a lot of fun!$k$pEveryone's let their guard down
because of the warm weather. It'll be
so easy to curse them!$k$pOr, wait...is the reason I'm dressed
like this because someone put a
curse on ME?$k$pWell, I guess that's OK. Because it
actually feels pretty great to be this
fluffy.$k$pI know! How about I put a curse on
you? Then you can go hippity-hop all
through town!$k$pI'm sure it will be unforgettable. Who
knows? You may even end up getting
addicted to the floof!
やあー！
うふふっ
ひゃあっ
いったぁ…
Spring is here!
Hareseye!
What shall I do with you?
Hop! Hop!
Whaaat? No....
Hmmm?
The spring festival sure is fun. Thanks for inviting me!
Ooo, you got me! Nice one—you'll pay for that later!
Most of my friends are crows. Not the right crowd for this festival, I think.
Bunnies are so fluffy!
I never wear such cute colors. How do they look on me?
So things can be fun even without anyone dying? Huh.
Bunny ears are a lot of fun. You should give them a try!
I'm off!
Whoosh!
Let's get hopping.
